description: Installation of internal secondary glazing at first floor on rear elevation.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
Previous Application No: 2010/6534/L 

Proposal:
Installation of secondary glazing to front elevation windows at first to third floor level; new external condenser unit and replacement roof light both at rear sloping roof area at first floor level; associated internal refurbishment works including structural repairs and new lighting to all floors, provision of floor mounted units and boxes at basement and first to third floor level and removal of internal partition and soil pipe at second floor level.

Decision: The Council has considered your application and decided to grant Listed Building Consent subject to the conditions.
